headline: American Water Named on Forbes America's Best Large Employers 2025 List
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., March 20, 2025--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., announced today that it has been named on Forbes America's Best Large Employers 2025 list. The ranking is based on an independent survey of employees.
